mapper.select: select hiba_g_sc.gsno, hiba_g_sc.mno, hiba_g_sc.gno, hiba_g_sc.gpno, hiba_g_sc.st_dt, hiba_g_sc.ed_dt, hiba_g_sc.sc_title, hiba_invit.COLOR from hiba_g_sc inner join hiba_invit on hiba_g_sc.mno = hiba_invit.mno and hiba_g_sc.gno = hiba_invit.gno inner join hiba_place on hiba_place.gpno = hiba_g_sc.gpno
select mno, name, nicknm, email from hiba_g_sc where mno = #{value}
select mno, name, nicknm, email from hiba_g_sc where mno=#{no} and pwd=password(#{password})
select mno, name, nicknm, email from hiba_g_sc where EMAIL=#{email} and PWD=password(#{password})
mapper.insert: insert into hiba_g_sc(mno, gno, gpno, st_dt, ed_dt, sc_title) values (#{memberNo}, #{groupNo}, #{groupPlaceNo}, #{start}, #{end}, #{title})
